```{r}
#| label: gene-drugs
#| echo: false

#| warning: false

load_ddh_data(app_data_dir, #defined in setup
              object_name = c("gene_drugs_table"))

make_gene_drugs_table(input = list(type = params$type, content = params$content)) %>% 
  gt::gt() %>% 
  gt::cols_hide(columns = c("fav_gene")) %>% 
  gt::cols_label(
    fav_drug = "Drug", 
    moa = "Mechanism of Action"
  ) %>% 
  gt::tab_options(table.width = gt::pct(100))
```

This table shows drugs that are known to target `r params$content`.
